# Rural Service Request Portal - MERN Stack Project

## Project Overview
A comprehensive rural service request portal built with MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) that enables citizens to raise complaints, departments to manage their assigned complaints, and administrators to oversee all operations.

## Features
- Landing page with information about the portal
- User authentication (Login/Register)
- Role-based access control (Citizen, Department, Admin)
- Citizen Dashboard: Raise and track complaints
- Department Dashboard: View and manage department-specific complaints
- Admin Dashboard: View all complaints, escalate, and manage system

## Project Structure
- `/backend` - Node.js/Express API server
- `/frontend` - React application
- MongoDB for database

## Technology Stack
- **Frontend**: React, React Router, Axios, Bootstrap/Material-UI
- **Backend**: Node.js, Express.js, JWT authentication
- **Database**: MongoDB with Mongoose ODM
- **Authentication**: JWT tokens, bcrypt for password hashing
